column5:
Hey there! Do you strip and paint RVs? And are you an authorized applier of any of the paint protective technologies (ceramic coating, polymer/acrylic film, whatever)? One with a warranty?

I have a 40 foot RV that probably needs to be just stripped and repainted, and I would like it coated if possible. I am utterly flexible as it comes to time frame. Do you have a standard price for that?
